original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between business requirements and technical implementation, responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support complex business processes. As a Configuration Specialist, you will leverage your exceptional analytical skills, technical proficiency, and strong communication abilities to collaborate with stakeholders, translate requirements into effective system configurations, and continuously optimize our technology solutions. Your work will have a direct impact on the efficiency and performance of our vehicle configuration systems, which are vital to our business operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively bridge the gap between business and technical stakeholders
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Demonstrated experience in data analysis, including querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to work seamlessly with our technology stack
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts, and the ability to leverage these technologies to enhance system configurations and process improvements

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a configuration management, business analysis, or a similar role, with a proven track record of successfully delivering technical solutions that meet business requirements
- Experience working in an Agile environment, collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration space, providing a strong understanding of the unique challenges and requirements within this domain
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a technology-driven environment

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of our [mention specific system] platform and associated configuration management tools
- Experienced in data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Excel, and Tableau

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role requires a collaborative, solution-oriented mindset, as you will work closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand their needs and translate them into effective system configurations
- You will be expected to stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies that could enhance our vehicle configuration capabilities
- The work environment is fast-paced and dynamic, requiring the ability to prioritize, multitask, and adapt to changing business needs

Role Overview:
As a Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the seamless integration of our business processes and technology solutions. By leveraging your exceptional analytical skills, technical expertise, and strong communication abilities, you will serve as a bridge between stakeholders from various departments, translating their requirements into efficient and effective system configurations. Your work will directly impact the performance and optimization of our vehicle configuration systems, which are crucial to the success of our organization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with cross-functional stakeholders to thoroughly understand their business needs, capture detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Analyze and interpret the gathered requirements, then translate them into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Proactively identify areas for improvement in our existing systems and processes, and propose solutions to streamline operations and enhance efficiency through configuration changes and the adoption of best practices
- Thoroughly test all configurations to ensure they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to ensure institutional knowledge and facilitate future support and maintenance
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to facilitate the smooth implementation and ongoing support of the configured systems

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities, enabling you to bridge the gap between business and technical stakeholders and facilitate effective cross-functional cooperation
- Proficiency in translating technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences, ensuring clear and effective knowledge transfer
- Demonstrated experience in data analysis, including querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to work seamlessly with our technology stack and understand the technical implementation details
- Knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts, and the ability to leverage these technologies to enhance system configurations and process optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a configuration management, business analysis, or a similar role, with a proven track record of delivering successful technical solutions that meet business requirements
- Experience working in an Agile environment, collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and continuously improve processes

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration domain, providing a deep understanding of the industry-specific challenges and requirements
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a technology-driven, fast-paced environment

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of our [mention specific system] platform and associated configuration management tools
- Experienced in data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Excel, and Tableau

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role requires a proactive, solution-oriented mindset, as you will work closely with stakeholders from various departments to understand their needs and translate them into effective system configurations
- You will be expected to stay informed about industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies that could enhance our vehicle configuration capabilities and drive continuous improvement
- The work environment is fast-paced and dynamic, requiring the ability to prioritize, multitask, and adapt to changing business requirements

Role Overview:
As a Configuration Specialist, you will be a key player in aligning our business processes and technology solutions, ensuring seamless integration and optimal performance. By leveraging your exceptional analytical skills, technical expertise, and strong communication abilities, you will serve as a vital link between stakeholders from diverse departments, translating their requirements into efficient and effective system configurations. Your work will directly impact the success and continuous improvement of our vehicle configuration systems, which are critical to the overall success of our organization.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with cross-functional stakeholders, such as business analysts, subject matter experts, and IT professionals, to thoroughly understand their needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Analyze the collected requirements and translate them into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, and implementing and testing new configurations
- Proactively identify opportunities to optimize our existing systems and processes, and propose innovative solutions to streamline operations and enhance efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices
- Thoroughly test all configurations to ensure they meet the defined requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the solutions and gather feedback for further refinement
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps, ensuring institutional knowledge and facilitating future support and maintenance
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure the smooth implementation and ongoing support of the configured systems, fostering a collaborative and solution-oriented environment

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex business processes and translate them into effective technical solutions
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities, enabling you to bridge the gap between business and technical stakeholders and facilitate effective cross-functional cooperation
- Proficiency in translating complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences, ensuring clear and effective knowledge transfer
- Demonstrated experience in data analysis, including querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java and SQL, allowing you to work seamlessly with our technology stack and understand the technical implementation details
- Knowledge of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts, and the ability to leverage these technologies to enhance system configurations and process optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a configuration management, business analysis, or a similar role, with a proven track record of delivering successful technical solutions that meet business requirements
- Experience working in an Agile environment, collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and continuously improve processes

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience in the vehicle configuration domain, providing a deep understanding of the industry-specific challenges and requirements
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and their application in a technology-driven, fast-paced environment

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in the use of our [mention specific system] platform and associated configuration management tools
- Experienced in data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Excel, and Tableau

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role requires a proactive, solution-oriented mindset, as you will work closely with stakeholders from various departments to understand their needs and translate them into effective system configurations
- You will be expected to stay informed about industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies that could enhance our vehicle configuration capabilities and drive continuous improvement
- The work environment is fast-paced and dynamic, requiring the ability to prioritize, multitask, and adapt to changing business requirements, while maintaining a strong focus on delivering high-quality solutions
